text: Yogesh Gaur, commonly credited as Yogesh, (March 19, 1943 â€“ May 29, 2020) was an Indian writer and lyricist. He worked in Bollywood and was best known for composing the music scores for Anand. Yogesh died on May 29, 2020 in Mumbai at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Interview of Yogesh Screen Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian writers
